ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Prevent Flash Operation

Description

Prevent Flash Operation

CWE

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Memory (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Charge Pump

Attack Vectors

FIB (MITRE EMB3D TID-105)

Defenses

Flash operation should not be modifiable, Read back values after Flash erase to make sure data are gone., Potentially write garbage data after erase., Read back the Flash value after it has been written to make sure the proper data is stored.
